quote: He who loves his country loves its language.
The youth is the hope of our future.
source: Speech at a banquet in honor of Juan Luna and Félix Resurrección Hidalgo

quote: Virtue lies in the middle ground.
He who does not know how to look back at where he came from will never get to his destination.
Without education and liberty, which are the soil and the sun of man, no reform is possible, no measure can give the result desired.
I have to believe much in God because I have lost my faith in man.
I do not write for revenge; I write for the sake of truth and freedom.
source: Letter to the Members of La Solidaridad

quote: The glory of saving a country is not for him who has contributed to its ruin.
I die without seeing the dawn brighten over my native land. You who have it to see, welcome it for me.
